title: 219. Preventing Crime for Pennies on the Dollar
description: Conventional programs tend to be expensive, onerous, and ineffective. Could something as simple (and cheap) as cognitive behavioral therapy do the trick?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
